sentences.sContent: The charges are false, and we are sure we will be vindicated in court.
sentences.sCn: 指控不实，我们确信法庭会证明我们是无辜的。

synos.tran: 维护；证明…无辜；证明…正确

remMethod.val: vin(=force 力量) + dic(说) + ate → 使有力地说 → 证明…正确

trans.tranOther: to prove that someone who was blamed for something is in fact not guilty
